Seems like you haven\'t join any events yet!
Tell us what can be improved

At Eatmou, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy applies to Eatmou and explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our app. By using Eatmou, you agree to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, do not use our app.

We collect information about you when you use our app, including: 
Personal information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you create an account or register to use our app. 
Usage information: We may collect information about how you use our app, including the types of invitations you send and the parties you attend. 
Device information: We may collect information about the device you use to access our app, including the device's IP address, operating system, and browser type.

We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our app, and to personalize your experience. We may also use your information to communicate with you, including to send you updates and marketing messages.

We may share your information with third parties in the following circumstances: 
With service providers: We may share your information with service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting or maintaining our app. 
With business partners: We may share your information with business partners for marketing and promotional purposes. 
As required by law: We may disclose your information if we are required to do so by law or if we believe that such action is necessary to comply with legal processes, to protect the rights and safety of ourselves or others, or to protect against legal liability.

We will retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with the services offered through our app. We will take reasonable steps to protect the security of your information, including through the use of encryption and secure servers. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or to comply with legal requirements. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at eatmou@gmail.com.

Welcome to our app, the platform for connecting with friends and strangers alike to share meals and create food parties! By using our app, you agree to the following terms of service: 

You are responsible for your own actions and the content you post on the app. This includes ensuring that you have the right to post any content that you share, and that such content does not violate any laws or the rights of others. 

You must be at least 13 years old to use the app. If you are under 13, you may not use the app. 

You may not use the app for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. This includes, but is not limited to, the creation of food parties that violate any laws or regulations. 

We reserve the right to remove any content or user accounts that we determine to be in violation of these terms of service. 

We are not responsible for the actions of any users of the app. You use the app at your own risk, and we recommend that you exercise caution and good judgment when interacting with others on the app. 

We may change these terms of service at any time, and it is your responsibility to stay informed about any changes. If you do not agree to the revised terms, you must stop using the app. 

By using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Welcome to our app, the platform for connecting with friends and strangers alike to share meals and create food parties! We are excited to have you as part of our community and want to ensure that everyone has a positive experience on the app. To that end, we have established the following guidelines for all members of the community to follow: 

Be respectful of others. We encourage friendly and polite interactions between all users of the app. Any harassment, abuse, or bullying will not be tolerated. 

Keep it clean. Please refrain from posting any offensive, inappropriate, or sexually explicit content on the app. 

Protect your privacy. Do not post any personal information about yourself or others on the app. This includes, but is not limited to, phone numbers, addresses, and personal photos. 

Follow the law. Do not use the app to engage in any illegal activities or to plan food parties that violate any laws or regulations. 

Report any problems. If you encounter any content or behavior on the app that you believe violates these guidelines or the law, please report it to us immediately. 

By following these guidelines, you will help create a safe and welcoming community on the app. Thank you for your cooperation!
